attributes.action: welcome the forthcoming visit of the Holy Father, Pope Benedict XVI, to this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a large community of Roman Catholics in this country who are looking forward with great joy to the forthcoming visit of our spiritual leader, Pope Benedict XVI, to our country. We believe that there are  
many non-Catholic Christians in this country who also welcome the visit and even many non-Christians of good will. We ask that our Government should take immediate steps make it abundantly clear that all religious leaders of good will are welcome to visit our country and that, specifically, Pope Benedict XVI will be most welcome when he comes to visit us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
